title: Blue, Red, Brown? Understanding Mechanical Key Switches
description: Confused by switch colors? We break down the three main types of mechanical switches and who they are for.
author: Free Online Typing Team
content:
Linear (Red, Black, Yellow)

Smooth travel, no bump. Preferred by gamers for consistency.

Tactile (Brown, Clear, Holy Panda)

A bump halfway down to feel the actuation. Preferred by typists.

Clicky (Blue, Green)

Tactile bump plus a loud click sound. Loved by some, hated by coworkers.
